videos.description: Lamar Stevens doesn't let his defender bother him as he finishes with a bucket and a foul for the Cavaliers.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Lamar Stevens shakes off contact to score and-1 bucket) 2022/01/02 ESHEET

videos.headline: Lamar Stevens shakes off contact to score and-1 bucket

videos.description: The Cavs' Jarrett Allen makes an amazing circus shot and gets the and-1.

videos.headline: Jarrett Allen gets bumped and hits impossible and-1 circus shot

videos.description: The Cavs' Kevin Love nails the buzzer-beater to end the third quarter.
